casebody.data:
Greta HUSSERL, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. SWISS AIR TRANSPORT COMPANY, LTD. also known as Swissair, Defendant-Appellant. No. 42, Docket 73-1501. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Oct. 23, 1973. Decided Oct. 31, 1973. George N. Tompkins, Jr., New York City (Condon & Forsyth, New York City, of counsel), for defendant-appellant. Eric Gewurz, Bellmore, N. Y. (Edward J. Waldman, Gewurz & Gewurz, P. C., Bellmore, N. Y., of counsel), for plaintiff-appellee.

Before SMITH, MANSFIELD and OAKES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The order of the district court is affirmed, essentially for the reasons set forth by Judge Tyler in his well considered opinion, 351 F.Supp. 702, at 706-707 (S.D.N.Y.1972).
